list.name: Godot Engine Draft PR#101479
list.desc: Add a method to get (global space) AABBs of collision shapes ([GitHub](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/101479))

list.name: UATerry
list.desc: UAT locator and command builder for Unreal Engine projects ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/UATerry))

list.name: terry_motor.gd
list.desc: Custom kinematic motor reimplementation for Godot 4 with expanded featureset

list.name: MagickaMod
list.desc: Unofficial patch fixing crash/desync issues for Magicka 1

list.name: GDEase
list.desc: Directly drawing to Godot Canvas surfaces for UI + functional implementation of easing curves ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/GDEase))

list.name: EVATimer
list.desc: Toy project recreating the battery timer screen from Evangelion. Made with Godot 4. ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/EVATimer))

list.name: EarTrumpet (Fork)
list.desc: Implemented device hiding logic and UI in WPF app ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/EarTrumpet))

list.name: p4me
list.desc: Command-line utilities for managing a small (<100 user) Perforce server including user pruning scripts and one-click revert of (exclusive) checked out files. ([GitHub](https://github.com/AIE-Seattle-Prog/p4me))

list.name: Undisclosed project
list.contribution: Created a semi-open-world dating sim with platforming elements. Other systems include (mini-)quests, character, and save/load of world state + player state.

list.name: StarRatings
list.contribution: Open-source plugin that allows rating games in Playnite with 1-5 (or whatever) stars instead of numbers. Started as a personal project, but open for public use.

list.name: unitywhere
list.desc: Artist/designer friendly unity project launcher ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/unitywhere)), inspired by vswhere

list.name: MoreGizmos
list.desc: Extended debug rendering tools for Unity ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/MoreGizmos))

list.name: Raylib PR#1302
list.desc: Free leaked allocations from render objects when using rlgl with OpenGL ([GitHub](https://github.com/raysan5/raylib/pull/1302))

list.name: UNETEntities
list.desc: Lag comp. and client prediction demo ([GitHub](https://github.com/terrehbyte/UNETEntities))

list.name: Vextar
list.contribution: Implemented gameplay mechanics with server-authoritative networking, and UI systems.

list.name: Blubber Busters
list.contribution: Regularly created and validated builds from trunk after integrating code from other contractors.

list.name: Sinasprite
list.contribution: Coordinated efforts between engineering, art, design, and leadership while responsible for UI and gameplay systems. Migrated the team from SVN to Git as well as from DGUI to uGUI.
